REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0950 reute r f BC-COLOROCS-<CLRX>-EXTEN 04-08 0045

TEXT.TITLE: COLOROCS <CLRX> EXTENDS WARRANT EXERCISE PERIOD
TEXT.BODY: Colorocs Corp said it has extended the expiration of the exercise period for its Class A warrants to May Eight from April 16. Each warrant allows the holder to buy a common share for 3.75 dlrs. Reuter
